channel.title: Item search command
channel.description: I am using a 508 Espeon based source and i was just wondering, is it possible to add a command which would list all item names with their item id next to them, even changed item names, like i have donator items on my server and will it come up because alot of people are asking me for item ids. Thank you soo much.

item.title: Item search command
item.dc:creator: @DemonsworldOwner DemonsworldOwner
item.description:
@DemonsworldOwner wrote:

[quote=“sonicforce41, post:1, topic:335384”]I am using a 508 Espeon based source and i was just wondering, is it possible to add a command which would list all item names with their item id next to them, even changed item names, like i have donator items on my server and will it come up because alot of people are asking me for item ids.
Thank you soo much.[/quote]
You would have to make the command your self. . .and all the ids wouldnt fit on 1 command list.

Read full topic
